meanings.definition: Having columns at the front only.
meanings.sent1: The prostyle building had tall columns only in the front.
meanings.sent2: The architect designed a prostyle structure with columns at the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The prostyle house looked like it was wearing a fancy front cape of columns.
meanings.sent4: The prostyle design of the building gave it a regal and imposing appearance.
meanings.sent5: The prostyle architecture stood out with its grand front columns.

meanings.definition: A building with columns only at the front.
meanings.sent1: We visited the prostyle to admire its impressive front columns.
meanings.sent2: The ancient prostyle was a sight to behold with its majestic entrance.
meanings.sent3: The prostyle reminded me of a person with a big smile only in the front.
meanings.sent4: The prostyle building stood like a sentinel with its front columns guarding the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The prostyle structure stood proudly with its front columns reaching towards the sky.

meanings.definition: A temple with columns only at the front.
meanings.sent1: The prostyle temple was a symbol of ancient architectural beauty.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the prostyle's grand entrance with towering columns.
meanings.sent3: The prostyle temple looked like it was peeking out from behind a row of columns.
meanings.sent4: The prostyle temple stood like a sentinel at the edge of the city.
meanings.sent5: The prostyle temple's front columns created a striking silhouette against the sky.
